title: New: Animal Collective – Crimson
content:
Animal Collective have dropped the b-side to their upcoming ‘Applesauce‘ 10″ single, which comes in the form of unreleased material.

Crimson was premiered over at Zane Lowe‘s BBC Radio 1 show last night, however if you didn’t catch it, we certainly didn’t, then hit play below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
